Help and support
Tiny Life is a Northern Ireland premature and vulnerable baby 
charity, visit www.tinylife.org.uk
Bliss, the neonatal charity, supplies all neonatal services with 
a free Parent Information Guide, which you should be given on 
admission.
For more information visit the Bliss website www.bliss.org.uk
